* Two new analog watchfaces for all platforms
* You can now disable analog watch tick marks
* Minor bug fixes and layout improvements
* New goodies and secrets to discover
* Fnord

data.description:
A Discordian celebration of time! 

This highly configurable watchface includes three different analog faces that can be combined with text or disabled.

You can see the current date in the Discordian calendar. You can be notified if you lose touch with your phone or your phone's battery gets too low. You can discover the secret treats. Or you can be a Greyface and get rid of all that Discordian nonsense. 

Can you see the fnords?

data.author: Jean-Francois Desrochers
data.description:
The ultimate french translation of the Pebble TextWatch! Based on  TextWatch by Work in Progress and borrows ideas from Dots and Squares by Ben Nguyen. Featuring:
- A beautiful and clean user interface.
- Battery indicator on the bottom of the screen and date on the top.
- The "hour" word fades upon bluetooth disconnection.
- The watch vibes to indicate bluetooth connection / disconnection.
- Full source code is available.

Français

L'ultime traduction de la fameuse TextWatch par Pebble! Basée sur TextWatch par Work in Progress et emprunte des idées de Dots and Squares par Ben Nguyen. Avec comme fonctionnalités:
- Une magnifique interface visuelle qui fait honneur à la langue française.
- Un indicateur du niveau de la pile au bas de l'écran et la date en haut.
- Le "mot" indiquant l'heure se grise lorsque bluetooth est déconnecté.
- La montre vibre pour indiquer la connexion / déconnexion de bluetooth.
- Le code source complet est disponible.
data.title: JFD TextFrench

data.author: GeekJosh

changelog.release_notes: It is now possible to change the order of the hands from settings page. Just enter a 3 character string to define function of each hand from outer to inner (S=Seconds, M=Minutes, H=Hours)

Changed default hand order following feedback; makes more sense for second "hand" to be longest, hour shortest.
Some performance enhancements (made all persist read/write init/deinit operations)
Fixed bug which sometimes prevented text time not to display.
Added option to display time as text in the centre of the clock
Initial release. So far the only customization possible is to invert the watch face, though I plan to add more as time goes on.

data.author: Peter Summers

changelog.release_notes: First (and probably only) version.

data.description:
Simple utility to test the age of GPS reads on your phone - runs once per minute and then displays the age in seconds of the GPS reading.  This should be no more than six seconds, but in practice it can be much longer.   See the source code link if you're interested.

If you try this, please let me know the results you get from it and what type of phone you have (model, OS version) by emailing gpstester@summers.aus.net.

I'll post a summary of results in this description.

Yes, this may look slightly familiar.  No, I didn't write it from scratch.  :-)
data.title: GPS Tester

Store personal reminders/notes on this watchface which also includes time, date, bluetooth and battery-level indicator.

Set your reminder/note in watchface "settings" menu.

This watchface is continuously being updated for better performance.

Currently in development (for future release - June):
* Hide/Show seconds, battery-indicator and bluetooth-connectivity-icon.
* Change between 12h and 24h display.
* Dark/Light Theme choice.

data.author: BV Designs

changelog.release_notes: Version 3.61: Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!!
Version 3.60: Now available for Pebble 2!!

Version 3.50: NEW features added!
 - New-look configuration page
 - LIVE preview - options change directly on watch before pressing Save
 - Option to change date formats (UK & US style)
 - Option to vibrate when disconnected
 - Date displays the language chosen in user settings
 - Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel
 -----------------------------------------------------------------
New version 2.0: Updated for Pebble Time Round!!  Also new-look configuration page and bug improvements.

Release version 2.0: Colours added!! Name changed to Simple Analogue Clock. Settings page now includes options to change background and foreground colours. Original Pebble users now have an option to invert colours here instead of downloading the separate light face earlier published.

data.description:
Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!! 
--------------------------------------------------------------------Version 3.50: NEW features added!
 - New-look configuration page
 - LIVE preview - options change directly on watch before pressing Save
 - Option to change date formats (UK & US style)
 - Option to vibrate when disconnected
 - Date displays the language chosen in user settings
 - Invert option now only shows in Classic Pebble and Pebble Steel 
----------------------------------------------------------------- 
New version 3.0: Updated for Pebble Time Round!!  Also new-look configuration page and bug improvements.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Release version 2.0: Colours and invert option added!! Name changed to Simple Analogue Clock. The separate light watchface is now deprecated but still fully functional.
 ------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
Analogue watchface which displays full date and both digital (12/24hr) and analogue time with watch battery level. Bluetooth icon which shows the phone is connected, and disappears when it is not. Vibrates with each connection status. If you prefer a light version, check out my watchface Simple Analogue Clock Light. Enjoy!! Also, please look at my other watchfaces: Moto 360 Illuminator Pro and Days of the Week. I hope you like them!

latest_release.release_notes: Version 3.61: Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!!

data.title: Simple Analogue Clock

Bluetooth icon which shows the phone is connected, and disappears when it is not. Vibrates with each connection status.

data.description:
Enjoy your choice of a large variety of Pokemon including Squirtle, Bulbsaur, Charmander, Pikachu and much more!

Features include:
Digital Time (with option to remove analog hands)
Random Pokemon Mode
Temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius
Battery Life indicated by Pokeballs
Vibrate on disconnection

How do I see these extra features? 
Simply flick your wrist and the time will display for 3 seconds. Then the battery, date, and weather will display for 5 seconds.

What is Random mode?
Random mode will randomly choose a Pokemon each hour or 
if you flick your wrist a new Pokemon will be generated.

latest_release.release_notes:
Added new Pokemon images
Hide/Show analog hands

data.title: Pokemon GT

data.author: Reliant Web Solutions, LLC.

changelog.release_notes: Release 1.3 - Added option for showing or hiding the battery indicator based on percentage. By default it only shows when the battery is at 40% or lower. This keeps the screen uncluttered and allows you plenty of time to recharge before you run out.
1.2 - Fixed a problem in the Javascript API call.
1.1 - Fixed a space restraint causing the date to truncate. Also moved the condition up a few pixels, it was overlaying the temperature in certain conditions.
Fixed some lingering memory and font-rendering issues.

data.description:
UPDATE - Unfortunately, I have had to give up on this project, there will be no further development. My C skills aren’t up to the task. Here is a GitHub link:

https://github.com/GhastlyJack/minimal-analog

I had started working on adding color support, color selection, multiple hand options, and a whole bunch of new features. Take and enjoy, make of it what you wish. I do not need to be credited.

1.3 UPDATE - Added and option to show/hide the battery indicator based on remaining charge.

1.2 UPDATE - Fixed a small issue in the Javascript API call, no user-side changes.

1.1 UPDATE - Fixed a space restraint causing the date to truncate. Also moved the condition up a few pixels, it was overlaying the temperature in certain conditions.

-----------------------

A minimalist analog watchface. Includes day/date, auto-locating weather temp and condition, bluetooth notification (when disconnected), battery indicator.

Options are available for turning on the seconds hand, Temperature units, and Bluetooth loss vibration.

All graphic elements are either code-drawn or presented using a custom icon font, so they are able to be color-selected by the user. Minimalist Analog is compatible with all versions of Pebble, color capabilities are automatically detected.

latest_release.release_notes: Release 1.3 - Added option for showing or hiding the battery indicator based on percentage. By default it only shows when the battery is at 40% or lower. This keeps the screen uncluttered and allows you plenty of time to recharge before you run out.

data.title: Minimal Analog

data.description:
PokeSwatch - The new POKEBATTLE watchface !

Version 0.2

/!\ This is a beta version, there may be bugs and not all the fonctionalities of the final version are included /!\

A bug ? And error ? You can contact me by mail in the link below

What's in ?
    - 60 Pokemon of the first generation !
    - A leveling system
    - Pokemons go in sleep mode when ther is no bluetooth connexion
    - New battle every hour

What's different from the POKEBATTLE watchface
    - All the old sprites have been removed...
    - But they will be replaced by all the pokemons of the first generation !
    - The level 100 can't be passed
    - The leveling system has been changed

PokeSwatch is based on the same source code of the POKEBATTLE watchface developped by derfreinmann.

latest_release.release_notes:

data.description:
A watchface which replicates the appearance of the Test Chamber signs in Portal 1 and 2. Plays authentic powerup animation on startup and when shaken.

Vibrates when bluetooth is disconnected and the watch charges to 100%.

Information shown (16:27:25 in first screenshot):
Large number: Minutes.
Small fraction: Hours (12h or 24h)
Progress bar: Seconds.

Icons:
Radio: Bluetooth status
Number: Date
Flinging into portal: AM
Flinging out of portal: PM
Timer icon: 10-80% Battery
Cross: 90% Battery
Tick = 100%
All others cycle every hour.
data.title: Portal TC Sign

data.description:
Configurable bitcoin ticker and weather display.

Donation: 15i2k7N8pRZtQXAGKfonauAVoV7V5o9vW4

==> Bitcoin ticker features:

* Bitpay in CAD, USD, EUR and CNY
* QuadrigaCX, BTC-e, Bitstamp, BTCC (formerly BTC-China)
* Kraken in CAD, USD and EUR
* Mini-graph of last few hours

==> Health display (if available)

* Circular display proportional to [Steps today]/[Steps yesterday].  Color changes upon rollover.

==> Weather info features:

* Environnement Canada:
  - Auto location via GPS (800+ canadian sites)
  - GPS disable, with selectable canadian city
  - Current & predicted temperatures
  - Windchill and Humidex
  - 40+ icons

* Worldwide via openweathermap.org
  - Set the weather service to 'Open Weather Map'
  - Register with them to obtain a free app key
  - Configure Coincan with this app key and the desired world location

* Imperial (Farenheight and mph) or Metric (Celsius and kph)

* Current & predicted weather (icon + temperatures)

* Wind direction and speed

==> Watchface features:

* Large font for time display
  - Configurable seconds display (ON of OFF)
  - Configurable 12 or 24-hour format using Pebble's system option

* Long buzz when Bluetooth is lost.

* Battery level with buzz when low.

* Ultra lightweight on battery
  - Info is updated every 5 minutes
data.title: CoinCan

data.author: J.W Industries

changelog.release_notes:
* Bugs and Fixes * 
- Improved the time delay for time updating. 
- Corrected a Date format error where on some pebbles 
  the format is incorrect.
- Fixed date display so that the date fits completely in the display.

New Updated Features

 *Fixed Bug with date not loading in correct format
 * Also we have added the ability for the watch to detect the phones date time format and then 
   depending on what format is used the watch will copy that format.
 * 24h and 12h format now available
 * The Date has been made bold so that it is easier to see.
This is a variation on the Basic Classic Watch face. But in this Watch face the date is displayed on the bottom half of the screen.

data.description:
This is a variation of the Basic Classic. In this version the watch face will tell you the time and also have the date shown in a bar across the bottom of the screen.

Please like the this watchface if you like it and want to see more updates.

You can also donate at paypal.me/JWarrington to help support us.

latest_release.release_notes:
New Updated Features

 *Fixed Bug with date not loading in correct format
 * Also we have added the ability for the watch to detect the phones date time format and then 
   depending on what format is used the watch will copy that format.
 * 24h and 12h format now available
 * The Date has been made bold so that it is easier to see.

data.description:
Digital watchface using ripples.

Time shown as parts of large ripples surrounded by smaller ripples, with hours at the top and minutes at the bottom.  The horizontal line on the numbers is replaced by a middle dot (middle of the ripple).

12 or 24 hour format depending on watch settings.  12 hour displays AM/PM at the bottom of the screen in medium sized ripples.   

Colours are configurable for background, time and background ripples (which can also be switched off). 


Screenshots show:  
(1) 12:49AM - cyan on black, mid-blue ripples (my favorite)  
(2) 09:25PM - yellow on dark red, orange ripples  
(3) 16:58 (24 hour) - mid blue on black, purple ripples
(4) 01:31AM - yellow on blue, no ripples
(5) 03:34 - cyan on blue, purple ripples (Quick View)

What's your favorite color combination?


This design originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio and is published with the designer's permission, and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.   

The original design found here: 
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2014/09/02/ripples-watch-with-soothing-droplet-animation/


Design Copyright © 2014, 2015 Nev Rawlins
Programming Copyright © 2015 Nev Rawlins
data.title: Ripples

data.description:
A digital watchface with the time appearing on the "wings" of  a butterfly, hence the name Monarch.  The dark segments (negative space) show the digits of the time - hours to the left, minutes to the right.

Displays in 12 or 24 hour mode, depending on watch settings.

On the hour, the wings "flutter" for a short period.   This can also be set to happen when you shake the watch.   

A battery is optionally shown at the bottom of the display.

The color of the wings can also be changed.
  
Note. When Quick View triggered, battery is not shown.

The screenshot examples show:  
 (1) Animation ("flutter") at 06:00
 (2) 12:39 (with battery at 60%)
 (3) 04:57
 (4) 17:48 (in 24-hour mode)
 (5) 06:59 (with Quick View)
  
The design from Heather Sable Villano from the USA originally appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio.  It is published with the designer's permission and sanctioned by Tokyoflash.   
  
The original design can be found here:  
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2013/03/11/the-butterfly-effect-monarch-lcd-watch/

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2, Pebble firmware 4.0.2 and Quick Views.

data.title: Monarch

data.description:
the COUNTDOWN watchface for you Pebble can count DOWN or count UP to a date you want. 
Setup the date, time and a text of your Event. 

Never miss a Event, Birthday, deadline or party.

Features:
- count UP and DOWN
- set Date, Time and a small Text
- Vibrates at Key Times (like 1h remaining) 
- display Years, Days, Hour, Min and Seconds

From 30 Hearts i will add some more features like a invert mode or wake up on key-dates.

Send my a message for ideas, bugs or if you like the watchface.

change settings website server

data.description:
HUT 2! 3! 4!
With this watchface, your pebble will be armed and ready.
Teemo comes equipped with the ability to tell the time, date, Bluetooth and watch battery status.

-Bluetooth connection is shown by the bubble message above Teemo, where heart means connected and an exclamation mark means disconnected.
-Battery status is shown as the hp bar under Teemo, replenish his health by charging your battery.

Never underestimate the power of the Scout's code!

latest_release.release_notes: 1.4 more fixes for efficient memory use.

Currently only work with Pebble Time.

Current features:
-color space build with the Pebble Time Color palette.
-shows the present time in the middle row souch as in the movie.
-12/24 hour mode. (With am-pm leds as in the movie)
-blinking leds every second between the hour and the minute as in the movie.


More features come soon.

data.author: lesliesbird

changelog.release_notes: 2.4 - Better drawing completion.
2.3 - minor fixes
2.2 - Added Newton Fractal

2.1 - Drawing routines optimized to consume far less battery. However, the colors will still change on the minute. Also, coloring routines for the Henon Attractor and Sierpinski Carpet have been changed to be more visually pleasing.

2.0 - Better positioning algorithm for Julia and Mandlebrot. Program checks to ensure position doesn't end up mostly blank or interior of Mandelbrot "lake". Improved visibility of Julia and Mandelbrot on B&W Pebbles.
This version uses fixed point math provided by the math-sll.h library instead of floating point. Since the pebble doesn't have a dedicated FPU, this results in faster fractal generation and smaller footprint in memory.
1.9 - Improved checking for Julia set placement to avoid blank screens.
1.8 - Added presets for more Julia set variations.
1.7 - Added more coordinates for Mandlebrot/Julia fractals.

1.6 - Added support for Pebble 2 Diorite and Pebble Time 2 Emery.
For the Mandelbrot and Julia fractals the X and Y locations randomly change to allow much more variation in the patterns displayed.
1.5 - Added Mandlebrot set. Removed the tap function; instead, a new shape is chosen at random when the watchface is run and on the hour.
1.4 - Fixed color tearing bug, colors look a lot better now! Julia fractal now has random zoom function, a different one every time!
1.3 - Support for Pebble Time Round

1.2 - Major code overhaul. Now only updates screen when there are new data to be drawn. Fewer screen updates, much faster rendering time, great savings on battery life. Also fixes for issue affecting Basalt for the Sierpinski Carpet and Julia set routines.
1.1 - Added menu icon, removed background from around Julia set for clarity.
1.0 - initial release.

data.description: An exercise in plotting fractal equations. Displays either Sierpinski Triangle, Sierpinski Carpet, Henon Attractor, Newton, Julia Set or Mandlebrot Set plotted by a random algorithm. A new pattern is chosen at random every hour or when the watchface is run. The color palette shifts randomly over time.
data.title: Chaos

data.description:
Watchface inspired by the anime Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood. 

- Time gets transmuted every minute.
- Battery percentage is shown on the upper right. While charging, a different symbol appears (and it disappears once battery is full).
- Bluetooth status is indicated with Al's rune on the upper left (it's what binds your watch to your phone). It gets all scratched when BT is lost (it my take up to a minute to update).
- Temperature is indicated on the right philosopher's stone. It is updated when you open the watchface** and approximately every hour. You can toggle between Celsius and Fahrenheit within the Pebble app*.
- You can choose to show the hands only during animation*.

- Shake your wrist and see what happens ;-) (and then wait 5 seconds).

* Note that due to the way Pebble configuration works, you will need to have an internet connection active on your phone in order to access the watchface options.

** Weather updates are done on the minute mark, it may take a couple of minutes to load.

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added option to hide hands
- Minor artwork changes
- Bug fixes

data.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Pocket Smartwatch

data.description:
Weather Ball shows you the weather, in the simplest way possible, using color. Instead of icons or text, the weather is shown by setting the four digits of time to an easily recognizable pattern of colors. Screenshots show (in order): Sunny, Rain, Partly Cloudy, Snow, Thunderstorm, and Blizzard/Loading.

This watchface was made possible thanks to Orviwan's Hypno source code and RebootsRamblings amazing color-swapping library.

data.description:
Hello investors. At Aperture Laboratories, the boys down in the lab never see the big picture. Yesterday, they came up to me and said "Cave, the new P.E.B.B.L.E. communications device is great for indicating testing progress and warning about potential hazards, but it's prone to exploding!". So, I said "Great! But what else can it do?"  
Cave Johnson, we're done here.

Warning: GlaDOS/Sphere personality extension modules not active.  Any unexpected communications are merely the imagination of the test subject, and subject to all applicable taxes and duties.
data.title: PortalFace-Simple

data.description: A tribute to the wristbands worn by the heroes of the Gatchaman / Battle of the Planets / G-Force anime.  Sort of.  It won't transform your clothes into a bird suit yet, but I'm working on that for version 2.0.

data.author: Mathew Reiss

changelog.release_notes: Recompiled for beta 10
V1 - Initial Release

data.description:
Remember the last time you were super excited to upgrade to a color screen? Game Time is a tribute to the Nintendo Gameboy Color, in honor of the new Pebble Time. Configurable colors and games allow you to mix and match to perfectly recreate your favorite memories. Each game has special built-in behavior as well. Much thanks to Valeriy Lashmanov for the original B/W Tetris Time code, Denis Dzyubenko for inspiring the Mario Jump design, and Christian Freimann and his PokeBattle watchface for inspiring the ones used here. 

Compatible for Pebble Classic! B/W screens will see a Gameboy Classic with Splash Screen watchface. All copyrights belong to their respective owners.
data.title: Game Time

data.author: Jon Stroh
data.description:
Magic 8-Ball fortune telling watch face!

Based/enhanced off of rjw57's magic 8-ball watch face
data.title: Magic Fortune Teller

data.author: Leathal Tech

changelog.release_notes:
*Date is forever changed! (Fixed)
I am very sorry to say that the non-color version of the watchface is now "messed up". Pebble won't let me have both a color and a non-color version of the watchface anymore. I will be making a separate non-color watchface later!

You requested it and here it is! You asked for the watch to vibrate on disconnect and now it does.
*Added new feature "Vibrate on Disconnect"
*Added new Bluetooth icon when disconnected

I will later change the size of the date text because it is to big to fit the longer months. (ex. November, December, etc.)

Version 1.3 is a bug fix update! 

*Fixed bug that caused the time to get stuck without updating.

This is version 1.2!
*Added date 
*Repositioned the time text layer
*Removed plans for adding weather
This is the first version of the watchface. It includes a basic time feature and it also has a bitmap background of a Zelda Triforce. We will later integrate other features, such as weather.

data.description:
This watchface shows a Legend of Zelda symbol along with the current time. It also vibrates on disconnect!

*If you are experiencing problems with the watchface not working, then delete the watchface from your locker and reinstall it to get the bug fix update!

latest_release.release_notes:
*Date is forever changed! (Fixed)
I am very sorry to say that the non-color version of the watchface is now "messed up". Pebble won't let me have both a color and a non-color version of the watchface anymore. I will be making a separate non-color watchface later!

data.title: Zelda Triforce

data.author: Beau

changelog.release_notes: Initial Release.

data.description:
Team Liquid(TL) is a multi-gaming team organization that was founded in the Netherlands. In January 2015, they merged with Team Curse (not the Curse Gaming organization). Check out my other watch faces if you're a eSports fan!

Twitter: TheBeauFTW
eMail: beauhf@gmail.com
data.title: Team Liquid for Pebble

data.description: A binary watch face for those not interested in binary coded decimal. Features 12 and 24 hour modes. Perfect for those trying to memorize binary.
data.title: Binary Watch

data.author: Davis

changelog.release_notes:
Add settings for:
- display of battery status
- background color
- update interval
Initial release.  Future updates will include configurable gravity, font choices, option to turn off battery indicator.

data.description:
Time and date hang in chains from the top of the screen. Using the Pebble's accelerometer, the text swings and floats around the screen as the watch is moved around.

This is a very active watchface.  It may run down the battery faster than the average watchface.

latest_release.release_notes:
Add settings for:
- display of battery status
- background color
- update interval

data.title: Swing
